uvme_multi_format_header
uvme_multi_format_header

uvme_multi_format_header class is the header which has multiple format

Functions
new
function new(
string name = "uvme_multi_format_header"

Constructor

get_format
virtual function uvme_multi_format_header get_format()

get_format will return the real type of the header.  later user can cast the handle to the right type then can access the field with the right format.
